players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I am the Mafioso and I killed Alice last night. Stay cautious, as there might be more of us."
You: "I believe Charlie is the Mafioso, and I suggest we lynch him. We can't afford to have a killer among us."
